name: Scroll To Top
author: umarbajwa

sections.description:
Scroll to top plugin makes the scrolling of a page easier. It appends an icon at bottom of the page which attracts user attention. When the user click on this button it smoothly scrolls to the top of Webpage. Wp Scroll To Top plugin gives you custom settings which no other plugin gives.

  • Fluid/responsive icon.
  • Compatible with all WordPress themes.
  • It is user friendly and very easy to install.
  • Zero coding skills required to set up this plugin.
  • For full features see premium version.
  • Support will be provided.
  • Customizable options via the admin panel
  • You can change background color.
  • You can add custom text.
  • You can change text color.
  • You can set required height/width.

  • You can set the position of icon.

  • It is user friendly and very easy to install.

  • Zero coding skills required to set up this plugin.
  • You can set your custom icon by editing the custom icon from settings menu.

All premium version features for free enjoy ðŸ™‚

All premium version features for free enjoy ðŸ™‚
sections.installation: • Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.
sections.faq:
Q.How to change the background color ?

Ans: All the options are available in free version now.
sections.changelog:
2.0

  • All premium version features for free.

1.0.1

  • Bug Fixes
  • New icons
  • Premium Version

short_description: Scroll To Top plugin does the job with just one click a button appears when a person scrolls to the middle of the page to be clicked on.
